description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) extracted user account data from the Security Account Managerr (SAM), making a copy of this database from the registry using the reg save command or by exploiting volume shadow copies.(Citation: Rostovcev APT41 2021)

external_references.description: Nikita Rostovcev. (2022, August 18). APT41 World Tour 2021 on a tight schedule. Retrieved February 22, 2024.
